item.title: STEPS Software Inc.
item.description: STEPS Software believes in the commercial value of Open Source Software / Free Software. It aims to establish a place for freeware among the traditional industries in Taiwan.

item.title: Linpus Technologies, Inc.
item.description: Linpus has worked on open source solutions across numerous platforms and products, building up a reputation for engineering excellence, and evolving into a world class software vendor.

item.description: Hyware provides services including Linux server web planning, site automation, information management, e Commerce, and administrative software.

item.description: LinuxYes uses a B2C, B2B oriented business model combining with a convenient web structure and integrated, high-quality products and services to achieve the greatest customer satisfaction possible.

item.title: KMD
